医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
抗雌激素疗法可以抑制 ER 阴性癌症的生长抗雌激素疗法可以抑制不表达雌激素受体的癌症的生长；当与免疫检查点抑制剂疗法相结合时，它们可以阻止小鼠模型中的肿瘤进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Anti-estrogenic-therapies-can-suppress-growth-of-ER-阴性-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Anti-estrogenic-therapies-can-suppress-growth-of-ER-阴性-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=673080b4-3161-4ad9-9638-f9399c3dc273 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 13:20:00 -0400 Anti-estrogenic therapies can suppress growth of ER-negative cancers
新型 DNA 抗凝剂可治疗肝素诱导的血小板减少症各种医疗情况，包括心脏病发作和 COVID-19 的极端病例，都需要使用抗凝剂和预防血栓的药物https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-DNA-based-anticoagulant-could-treat-heparin-induced-thrombocytopenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-DNA-based-anticoagulant-could-treat-heparin-induced-thrombocytopenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0b3a5c3-6ddb-41f3-b6d1-4364fc51a251 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 13:17:47 -0400 New DNA-based anticoagulant could treat heparin-induced thrombocytopenia
抑郁症幸存者花更多时间处理负面信息美国《美国医学会》发表的一项研究显示，与从未经历过重度抑郁发作的人相比，从重度抑郁发作中恢复过来的人往往会花更多的时间处理负面信息，而较少的时间处理积极的信息，从而使他们面临旧病复发的风险。心理学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Depression-survivors-spend-more-time-processing-negative-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Depression-survivors-spend-more-time-processing-negative-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca14bc4b-8bd3-4c9c-b312-405625c5a141 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 13:08:47 -0400 Depression survivors spend more time processing negative information
酒精相关性肠病：文献综述饮酒是胃肠道疾病（包括癌症）的重要危险因素。酒精会通过多种方式损害胃肠道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Alcohol-linked-bowel-disease-A-review-of-the-literature.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Alcohol-linked-bowel-disease-A-review-of-the-literature.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1461b380-f4ad-4665-8719-c272fc7fb098 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 13:03:59 -0400 Alcohol-associated bowel disease: A review of the literature
COVID-19 感染与高血压风险增加有关根据今天发表在美国心脏协会期刊《高血压》上的新研究，对超过 45,000 人的电子病历的分析发现，COVID-19 感染与高血压的发生显着相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/COVID-19-infection-linked-to-increased-risk-of-high-blood-压.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/COVID-19-infection-linked-to-increased-risk-of-high-blood-压.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22ca8303-9e31-41d0-8218-7b5669eba6ac Mon, 21 Aug 2023 12:57:02 -0400 COVID-19 infection linked to increased risk of high blood pressure
以微生物组为导向的食品可促进儿童营养研究人员重建了肠道细菌基因组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Microbiome-directed-foods-boost-child-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Microbiome-directed-foods-boost-child-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cff3c70-42dc-4059-a4f6-1062e6c7617b Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:53:00 -0400 Microbiome-directed foods boost child nutrition
MIND 饮食对认知的影响三年饮食干预对老年人认知能力下降的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-cognitive-effects-of-the-MIND-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/The-cognitive-effects-of-the-MIND-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab527435-697b-4fff-a0fd-56baa56967d6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:20:00 -0400 The cognitive effects of the MIND diet
长期新冠疫情是否导致英国劳动力市场不活跃？研究人员调查了英国工作年龄成年人的长期新冠疫情与随后的劳动力市场结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Has-Long-Covid-contributed-to-labor-market-inactivity-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Has-Long-Covid-contributed-to-labor-market-inactivity-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=872c9a35-da35-41b6-9c96-ec7efe30db21 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:18:00 -0400 Has Long Covid contributed to labor market inactivity in the UK?
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，婴儿的肠道微生物组组成是否发生了变化？最近的一项研究比较了 COVID-19 大流行之前和期间的婴儿肠道微生物组组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Did-the-gut-microbiome-composition-of-infants-change-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Did-the-gut-microbiome-composition-of-infants-change-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39d235de-4dba-4484-8710-7f70825d3012 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:12:00 -0400 Did the gut microbiome composition of infants change during the COVID-19 pandemic?
基于人工智能的新筛查策略使用心电图来检测心脏缺陷研究人员探索利用人工智能来提高使用 12 导联心电图进行 ASD 常规筛查的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-AI-based-screening-strategy-uses-ECG-to-detect-heart-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-AI-based-screening-strategy-uses-ECG-to-detect-heart-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95c737d3-4eec-4f24-904f-da8d55f22bb6 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 10:06:00 -0400 New AI-based screening strategy uses ECG to detect heart defects
